resources.string: This app functions as a receiver for sms commands. So you can control this phone by sending simple control messages. (e.g. rc enable hotspot) \nLets see how this works.

The receiver is listening for incoming sms and executes the received commands. It can be started and stopped manually by clicking the right button. \nIn order to start the receiver after boot, set the respective option in settings.

The control functions are grouped into modules. Each module contains one or multiple commands. (e.g. enable hotspot, disable hotspot) Incompatible modules are market with a red minus symbol and cannot be enabled.
